Question
========
(7) Tiga kali lempar koin fair. Berapa peluang tepat 2 sisi gambar?

Answerlist
----------
* P=3/8
* P=1/2
* P=1/4
* P=5/8

Solution
========
C(3,2)=3 susunan, total 2^3=8. Peluang 3/8.
